root: ^Oolong crouches on the dark rooftop, staring down at Pearl Palace. His eyes glint. Thunder rumbles softly in the distance.
^The world refused to share its boba with me.
^Now, I shall take what is rightfully mine."

laugh_evil: ^"MWAHAHAHA! They laughed at me when I sipped from the trash! But who’s laughing now?!"
whisper_moon: ^"O sweet tapioca moon... light my path to victory. They will rue the day they denied me extra pearls."
continue_monologue: ^"I used to be like them. Soft. Kind. Tame.
^Until I tasted the forbidden sip... brown sugar boba, perfectly chilled.
^"—the raccoon your nightmares warned you about!"
nightmare_raccoon: ^"—the raccoon your nightmares warned you about!"
finish_villain: ^He spreads his powerful little arms, wind fluttering through his fur. Somewhere, a cat meows ominously.
^And in its place, a new order shall rise - The Midnight Scanvanger!"
^Strike a pose and start the mission.
pouch_boba: ^Oolong pulls out a warm, slightly squished boba cup.
^"Not fresh... but still sweet victory in a cup."
alley: ^Oolong drop into the dark alley behind Pearl Palace. The smell of tea and caramelized syrup fills the air.
^The back door is locked, but there’s a vent above it... and a faint humming sound inside. You’re close.
^Soon... the Golden Boba will be mine."
